author: antazoey
content: Does anyone know how I can replicate a `evm_snapshot` / `evm_revert` using only endpoints availabe in `geth`, such as `debug_setHead` ?

author: antazoey
content: I seem to get nonce errors when I try to use `debug_setHead`  otherwise I think I could have something, I am not sure if this is a bug or not
